bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Bridges and Bridged Networks--Amendment 30: YANG Data Model
IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Bridges and Bridged Networks--Amendment 30: YANG Data Model

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A YANG data model in support of configuration and operational status information for a subset of Bridging capabilities is provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q&#x2122;-2018.

A YANG data model in support of configuration and operational status information for a subset of Bridging capabilities is provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q&#8482;-2018. (The PDF of this standard is available at no cost to you compliments of the IEEE GET program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=68)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
